ygData.subject: GAHHH!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I was playing EQ in Lower Guk and was just about to leave to camp when the enchanter in the group went for a pull. He did not tell us to run, nor did he warn
ygData.messageBody:
I was playing EQ in Lower Guk and was just about to leave to camp when the
enchanter in the group went for a pull. He did not tell us to run, nor did
he warn us that he was pulling almost half the zone. I was the main healer.
I saw him injured. So I healed him. Next thing I know, everything is on me.
I asked the backup healer to help me. Backuphealer did nothing. I died. I
was the only one who died though bc after healing and effectively taunting
mobs off the enc, he was able to mez. Right after I repopped after dying a
system message said half an hour til downtime to patch. So, I memmed spells
and was heading back for my corpse. 5 minutes later another system message
said "Servers coming down, log out now" I know this bc I did a /ti to
compare the times. So what does my group do? Rather than help me, they just
camped and left me there. So now I probably lost all of my stuff. I wish
they wouldn't lie about how long til patch time.
Sorry, just very frustrated.
-Su
